description: Fix function signature mismatches in ket() and tensor() function headers

71.1.reason: Function header only has 'dim' parameter but test cases call ket(2, 0), ket(2, [1,1]), ket([2,3], [0,1]) with two arguments. The docstring also mentions 'args: int or list, the i-th basis vector' as a second parameter.

71.2.reason: Function header has no parameters but test cases call tensor([0,1],[0,1]), tensor(np.eye(3),np.ones((3,3))), etc. with multiple arguments. The docstring states 'args: any number of nd arrays of floats' indicating variable arguments.

notes: These are clear signature mismatches where the function headers do not match the test case invocations. The fixes add the missing parameters without changing the scientific content of the task.
